ygData.subject: Re: RE: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Naw, you can do all 20+ languages this way, just not at once. Spam language #1 until you get two skill increases.  Switch to language #2 until you get two
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 29 Sep 1999, kbachman wrote:
>
> In fact, you should be able to train up to six languages at once (one for
> each grouped member), although odd numbers would be hard to keep track of
> (since you would need to cycle the languages, rather than just switch
> back and forth). Still, it shouldn't take that much longer to do
> multiple languages. Anyone on Innoruuk want to try it?

Naw, you can do all 20+ languages this way, just not at once.
Spam language #1 until you get two skill increases. Switch to
language #2 until you get two skill increases. Repeat for
half the languages (with your partner doing the other half),
then zone. Repeat on the other side.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
